author: milo.yang
content: Hi,I have a 0x02 type validator with 2048 ETH. It has been active for 12 days. From the probability point of view, The validator should have synced blocks and synchronization committees, but our validator has none. Why is that?Can anyone help answer this?https://hoodi.beaconcha.in/validator/b57b724396574ffed6b0cad3ded4b6712c0b60b0bb6a945fe80e4489c4447f9c838d0e378905959fada172d5d16bd584#deposits
